forum.content:
「 Now I’m rising from the crowd 此刻我將從人群裡崛起

Rising up to you 為你揭竿起義

Filled with all the strength I found 胸膛注滿了洶湧愛戀

There's nothing I can’t do! 我將所向披靡 」……
